Title: Manuale D'amore 3
Country: Italy
USA release:
Released in Spain: 19/08/2011

Released in Italy: 25/02/2011
Studio: Filmauro
Directed by Giovanni Veronesi
Written by: Giovanni Veronesi, Ugo Chiti
Starring: Robert De Niro, Monica Bellucci, Riccardo Scamarcio, Michele Placido, Laura Chiatti, Valeria Solarino, Donatella Finocchiaro, Carlo Verdone, Daniele Pecci, Marina Rocco, Vittorio Emanuele Propizio, Vincenzo Alfieri, Guido Genovesi

Synopsis:
Three new chapters of the Manual 3 D'AMORE Giovanni Veronesi, who, this time focusing his lens at different ages of love ...

"Youth" tells the story of Roberto (Riccardo Scamarcio), an ambitious young lawyer who is about to marry Sara (Valeria Solarino), and his overwhelming encounter with the beautiful, provocative and mysterious Micol (Laura Chiatti), with the to discover a reality outside of time, suspended between quirky characters and irresistible temptations.

"Maturity". Fabio (Carlo Verdone), a prominent television presenter, faithful husband for twenty-five years, is swept by a sudden and fatal encounter. The intriguing Eliana (Donatella Finocchiaro) is not who he claims to be. A whim becomes for him a tragicomic adventure: will not be easy to get rid of it!

"BEYOND". Adrian (Robert De Niro) is an American professor of art history, from a few years ago, after divorcing his wife, decides to live in Rome, a city that has always loved. Reserved and solitary, is treated with a few people, which account Augusto (Michele Placido), the doorman of the building where he lives. Maybe it's the only one who has revealed his secret: seven years before he underwent a delicate heart transplant. The explosive encounter with the daughter of Augustus, Viola (Monica Bellucci), alter their quiet existence and bring it to life sensations that had long been appeased and emotions that are new to him ...

The theme of the amorous adventures of the protagonists is an emblematic figure: the driver Cupid (Emanuele Propizio).

Production notes:
Third installment of Manuale d'amore (2005) and Manuale d'amore 2 (2007).
